titles.title: For the relief of the family of H. W. Hawes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 9/10/1998--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to real property on Matagorda Island, Texas, that was taken from a named individual by the Government in the World War II era, to such individual's son. Sets limits on attorney fees for services rendered in connection with the claim. Subjects violators to a fine.
